gameSection.title: What is WalkScape?
gameSection.section-1: WalkScape is a game inspired by some old school MMORPGs. But this game has one major trick up its sleeve: you don't play actively, but instead gain progress by walking.
gameSection.section-2: You can expect a fun and exciting journey through the World of Arenum while also having the motivation to walk!

features.title: Features
features.levelUpSkills: Level up skills by walking in real life
features.numberOfSkills: Over 15 different skills to level up and master
features.communityFeatures: Community features, global marketplace and online leaderboards.
features.quests: Quests, random encounters and a main storyline spanning multiple continents.
